Sarah Pethani

I'm Sarah Pethani, a junior at Carnegie Mellon University, majoring in Computer Science and minoring in Game Design.

My primary interests are computer systems and computer vision/graphics.

In the past, I've interned with Amazon, done research at CMU's Human-Computer Interaction Institute, and taught as a teacher assistant.

If you're interested in my professional development, see my resume!
